text: Korina Perkovac (born 7 July 1999) is a Swiss volleyball player. She is a member of the Women's National Team. She participated at the 2018 Montreux Volley Masters. She plays for Volley Nachwuchs Luzern. She is the daughter of Goran Perkovac. == References == == External links == * FIVB Profile * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss women's volleyball players Category:Swiss people of Croatian descent
title: Korina Perkovac
